answers.answer: HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!Since you have both diabetes and Hashimotos and have calf pain, swelling and heat, there are two things to be ruled out immediately. One is deep vein thrombosis (DVT) and atherosclerosis of calf blood vessels should also be looked into by angiograms or color dopplars. DVT can be dangerous if clot moves and lodges in heart, brain or lung. The other is cellulitis and infection under the skin. Both are potentially dangerous problems.Heart, kidney and liver function should also be assessed. Please discuss with your treating doctor immediately. Take care!
